Learning Resource Updates

New docs and major updates.

27-Sep-2024

New Docs

  • Title: Test Integration
  • Description: Allows you to test the connection of your MAP integrations.
  • Link: https://audience-insights.support.brightcove.com/integrations/test_integration.html

Major updates

  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for Android
  • Description: Android SDK Release v9.2.1
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-android.html
  • Title: Creating and Managing Live Events using the Live Module
  • Description: Visual example of live regions added
  • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/creating-and-managing-live-events-using-live-module.html
  • Title: Available Options for the Advanced (in-page) Embed Code
  • Description: Preload details section modify about using HLS and DASH as a main playback tech (Mp4 is less popular)
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/publish/available-options-advanced-page-embed-code.html
  • Title: Beacon Apps Ad Targeting
  • Description: Added macro to table
  • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/monetization/ssai/beacon-apps-ad-targeting.html
  • Title: Campaign 2.0 Setup and Integration Manual
  • Description: Added new section to the Integrations Setup
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/marketing-automation/getting-started/campaign-migration-set-up.html#Set_up_an_integration

13-September-2024

Major updates

  • Title: Playback Restrictions with Brightcove Player
  • Description: Using Concurrency and Registration section new steps
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/playback-restrictions-with-bcp.html#Using_Concurrency_and_Registration
  • Title: Overview: In-Page Experience Client API
  • Description: Gallery IPX: document a way to track user/viewer (Audience Insights)
  • Link: https://gallery.support.brightcove.com/develop/overview-page-experience-client-api.html
  • Title: Understanding SCORM Integration
  • Description: update section SCORM download option is only available with Lesson Experience projects
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/interactivity/general/understanding-scorm-integration.html#user-experience
  • Title: Overview: Using Aspera for Ingestion to Video Cloud
  • Description: Include minimum version info for Aspera
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/aspera/overview.html
